server

Class ServerRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ServerRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Thread that receives incoming requests from clients and delegates them to individual ServerResponse threads. Checks the requests are valid and sends an error packet back if they are not.

      • verify

        public boolean verify(byte[] msg)
        Method to make sure that the data is in the proper format
        Parameters:
